>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">John Smith. “Chapter Title.”</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" version="1.0" demote-non-dropping-particle="never" page-range-format="minimal-two">
  <info>
    <title></title>
    <id></id>
    <updated>2018-01-09T14:13:59+00:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale xml:lang="en">
    <style-options punctuation-in-quote="true"/>
  </locale>
  <macro name="author">
    <names variable="author">
      <name/>
      <label form="long" prefix=", "/>
    </names>
  </macro>
  <macro name="title">
    <text variable="title" quotes="true" text-case="title"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="Bogus"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <sort>
      <key macro="author"/>
      <key variable="title"/>
    </sort>
    <layout suffix=".">
      <group delimiter=". ">
        <text macro="author"/>
        <text macro="title"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "URL": "http://example.com", 
        "author": [
            {
                "family": "Smith", 
                "given": "John"
            }
        ], 
        "id": 276, 
        "title": "Chapter Title", 
        "type": "chapter"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
